title: Build failure on master/OpenBSD.

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

body:
Hi,

Following the build instructions here:
https://pulse-forum.ind.ie/t/building-syncthing/44

On OpenBSD/amd64 with today's git master:

```
$ go run build.go  
GOPATH is /home/edd
GOPATH=/home/edd/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/Godeps/_workspace:/home/edd
go install -v -ldflags -w -X main.Version v0.10.2 -X main.BuildStamp 1413658240 -X main.BuildUser edd -X main.BuildHost wilfred.dlink.com -X main.BuildEnv default ./cmd/...
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/cmd/stevents
code.google.com/p/go.text/transform
github.com/calmh/xdr
code.google.com/p/go.crypto/blowfish
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/logger
code.google.com/p/go.crypto/bcrypt
code.google.com/p/go.text/unicode/norm
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/events
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/osutil
github.com/bkaradzic/go-lz4
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/luhn
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/lamport
github.com/syndtr/goleveldb/leveldb/util
github.com/syndtr/goleveldb/leveldb/comparer
github.com/syndtr/goleveldb/leveldb/cache
github.com/syndtr/goleveldb/leveldb/filter
github.com/syndtr/goleveldb/leveldb/iterator
github.com/syndtr/goleveldb/leveldb/journal
github.com/syndtr/goleveldb/leveldb/opt
github.com/syndtr/goleveldb/leveldb/memdb
github.com/syndtr/goleveldb/leveldb/storage
code.google.com/p/snappy-go/snappy
github.com/syndtr/goleveldb/leveldb/table
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/protocol
github.com/juju/ratelimit
github.com/syndtr/goleveldb/leveldb
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/auto
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/beacon
github.com/AudriusButkevicius/lfu-go
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/fnmatch
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/config
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/discover
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/ignore
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/scanner
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/versioner
github.com/calmh/osext
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/upnp
github.com/vitrun/qart/gf256
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/upgrade
github.com/vitrun/qart/coding
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/files
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/stats
github.com/vitrun/qart/qr
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/cmd/stindex
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/model
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/cmd/syncthing
# github.com/syncthing/syncthing/cmd/syncthing
cmd/syncthing/usage_report.go:80: undefined: memorySize
exit status 2
exit status 1
```

I know _nothing_ about go, but the line causing the error is:

```
        bytes, err := memorySize()
```

Do you need to import this function or something? There is a possibility the function is missing on OpenBSD.

Cheers
